The Quranic researcher, their eyesight is a state of marvelous, who calls on their eyesight that they are raised by the effectiveness and the proportions of fear to the sight of the appearance of their effect in which they have been affected by them () And they cheated (humiliation), and they were invited to prostrate in the world and the emergence in the position of the guests to increase the decree, or because what is meant by the ritual of the ritual, as he said.Al -Nakhti and the people, or all obedience as it was said.The claim is the call of the mandate.They answer him, refuse him, and leave this remembrance of his appearance.
